author: CMS-ECAL-Trigger-Group
body:
Two scripts were missing in the CondDB utilities for the ECAL TPG double weights code

- `updateTPGOddWeightIdMap.py` 
- `updateTPGOddWeightGroup.py` 

The scripts are used to convert ECAL TPG txt config files to CondDB tags to be used in the emulator for private studies or uploaded in the global tag. 

Added unit tests for Ecal TPG weights mapping scripts. 

This PR has no side effects.
title: Adding missing scripts for ECAL TPG double weights + unit tests
